alert.note: Alert for Craven; Duplin; Jones; Lenoir; Onslow; Pamlico (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 10 at 6:19PM EDT until August 10 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Newport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Jones County in eastern North Carolina... South central Lenoir County in eastern North Carolina... Central Craven County in eastern North Carolina... Northwestern Onslow County in eastern North Carolina... East central Duplin County in eastern North Carolina... Southwestern Pamlico County in eastern North Carolina... * Until 715 PM EDT. * At 619 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Potters Hill, or 14 miles northwest of Half Moon, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... New Bern, James City, Trent Woods, River Bend, Phillips Crossroads, Beulaville, Comfort, Tuscarora, Rhems, Olympia, Potters Hill, Petersburg, Pleasant Hill, Croatan, Riverdale, Catfish Lake, Neuse Forest, Fairfield Harbour, Coastal Carolina Regional Airport and Bridgeton. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please send your reports of hail and/or wind damage, including trees or large limbs downed, by calling the National Weather Service office in Newport at 1-800-889-6889.

area.areaDesc: Craven; Duplin; Jones; Lenoir; Onslow; Pamlico
